Description: Duties of Position: The Car Wash Manager will be required to manage the day-to-day operations by ensuring the smooth operations at the car wash, and is responsible for the daily operations, manage Inventory and handling Customer enquiries whilst liaising with the Owner on a regular basis.Duties include, but are not limited to:▪ Assure excellent Customer experience for every Customer – at all times Including maintaining a clean environment in all the Bays.▪ Drive revenue & growth by following Company procedures▪ Ensure opening and closing times and safety procedures are followed ▪ Monitor and perform chemical inventory as needed▪ Perform weekly vacuum, vending and general supply inventory review and requests ▪ Manages inventory/ordering via online, by email, or by fax as appropriate▪ Perform repair and preventative maintenance to wash, vacuums and vending equipment. ▪ Carry out weekly and monthly reporting.▪ Personally, handle customer enquiries or issues▪ Co-ordination of trades people and suppliers when appropriate ▪ Collection, counting, reconciliation and banking of monies▪ Use such materials as water, cleaning agents, brushes, cloths and hoses ▪ Constant supervision and upkeep of premises▪ Scheduling of Casual personnel when appropriate▪ Foster a team environment▪ Anticipate, prevent, identify and solve problems as necessary▪ Comply at all times with Company standards and regulations to encourage safe and efficient car wash operations.▪ Maintain high standards of personal appearance and grooming, which include wearing proper Uniform attireSkills
Skills: With at least 2 Years experience and willing to relocate from Doha To Saudi ---
Doha: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Required)
